'''Ignited Treasure Hunter (II)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (II)]]''. The achievements are earned by opening [[chest]]s in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Quahuacan Cliff]], and [[Ochkanatlan]].
